Atchison, Topeka, and Santa Fe Railway Company

Items on menu: Dinner; Appetizers and Soups; Salads; Dessert; Beverage list ; Meals served: Dinner; Dessert. Representative dishes: Fruit Cocktail au Kirsch, Open Faced Chicken Salad on Toast, Sliced Tomato, Hard Boiled Egg and Capers, Layer Cake, Beverage ($2.50). Charcoal Broiled Halibut Steak, Parsley Butter: Mashed Potatoes, Corn, Mexicaine; Mixed Green Salad, Lorenzo Dressing; Dinner Rolls, Choice of Dessert and Beverage ($3.75)

Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections

The Ira Silverman Railroad Menu Collection consists of 238 items: 227 menus and eleven pamphlets. 35 United States and Canadian railroads are represented in the collection. All menus were issued by their respective railroad.
